{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
filesystem_error&amp; operator=( const filesystem_error&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Assigns the contents with those of {{c|other}}. If {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} both have dynamic type {{tt|std::filesystem::filesystem_error}} then {{c|1=std::strcmp(what(), other.what()) == 0}} after assignment.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|filesystem_error}} object to assign with}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Notes===
Typical implementations store {{tt|path}} objects referenced by {{lc|path1()}} and {{lc|path2()}} in a reference-counted storage. As a result, {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} usually share their {{tt|path}} objects after assignment.
